name: emoncms
tagline: A web platform for logging, processing, and visualizing energy data
description: Emoncms is a web-based application for logging, graphing, and processing energy and environmental data. Designed for energy monitoring setups, it supports feeds, dashboards, input processing, and integration with IoT devices.

features.title: Energy Monitoring
features.description: Track power consumption and generation. Understand your energy usage

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Beautiful graphs and dashboards for insights. Clear energy patterns

features.title: Feed Processing
features.description: Transform and analyze incoming data streams. Flexible data handling

features.title: Iot Integration
features.description: Connect with energy monitoring devices. Comprehensive system support

features.title: Environmental Data
features.description: Log temperature, humidity, and more. Complete monitoring solution

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your energy data private. Your consumption, your control
